sentences.en: An all - region DVD player such as Apex is strongly recommended.
sentences.cn: 大多数dvd产品的区域编码是6.我们建议您使用全区播放器来放映我们的产品.不存在区域编码问题.

sentences.en: AoA DVD Ripper's upgrade is free for registered users.
sentences.cn: 农产品协定的DVD开膛手的升级是免费的注册用户.

sentences.en: Both the CD and DVD are available separately and as a package.
sentences.cn: CD和DVD既可以单独出售也可以打包购买.

sentences.en: Can you rent a DVD on your way home from work?
sentences.cn: 你能在下班回家的路上租片DVD 吗 ?

sentences.en: Car radio faceplates, satnavs and portable DVD players were also common.
sentences.cn: 汽车收音机、卫星导航器和便携式DVD也很普遍.

sentences.en: Compared to the TV set, using DVD is a big leap.
sentences.cn: 与看电视比较, 使用DVD是一大飞跃.

sentences.en: DVD technology plays an important role in digital technology.
sentences.cn: DVD技术在数字技术中占有重要地位.

sentences.en: Great video audio quality for region free dvd duplication.
sentences.cn: 伟大的视频音频质量,为地区的免费DVD复制.

sentences.en: I have the complete series of this soap opera on DVD.
sentences.cn: 我有这部电视剧的整套DVD版.

sentences.en: Is it available on DVD yet?
Moving or still images are recorded onto the DVD disc.
sentences.cn: 移动或静止的图像被转录在DVD碟片上.

sentences.en: The DVD may be in use by another application or is copy - protected.
sentences.cn: 该DVD可能正由其他应用程式使用中或禁止拷贝的).

sentences.en: This DVD player reproduces the sound of the piano very well.
sentences.cn: 这部DVD播放机能够很好地再现钢琴的声音.

sentences.en: This same method is used for error correction in DVD technology.
sentences.cn: DVD技术中的错误校正使用的是同样的方法.

phrases.tran_cn: DVD播放器；数位影音播放机
